name: Clash of Exiles
description:
Hello!

Welcome to the Beta tests of the game for my Final Year Project! Clash of Exiles is a prototype of a MOBA game that focuses on one-on-one battles taking place in an Arena designed specifically for that purpose. The player has three characters to choose from, each with a unique set of skills. The goal of the game is to destroy the enemy Crystal of Life.

After you've played the game please complete the form below (4 questions, 1 min).

https://forms.office.com/r/88RSLrsJWu

Version: 1.0 Open Beta
